parameters.name: DestinationFilePath
parameters.description: Path and name of file to import (see Remarks )

parameters.name: ReplaceData
parameters.description: True to replace data, false to not

parameters.name: ErrorFile
parameters.description: True to create an error file, false to not

title: ISldWorks.ImportHoleWizardItem
description: Imports data for the specified Hole Wizard standard.
signature:
System.Int32 ImportHoleWizardItem( 
   System.String
StdToImport
,
   System.String
DestinationFilePath
,
   System.Boolean
ReplaceData
,
   System.Boolean
ErrorFile
)

parameters.name: DestinationFilePath
parameters.description: Path and name of file to import (see Remarks )

parameters.name: ReplaceData
parameters.description: True to replace data, false to not

parameters.name: ErrorFile
parameters.description: True to create an error file, false to not

returns: 0 if the Hole Wizard standard imported successfully, 1 if not
remarks:
Specify StdToImport with the path and file name as shown on the Hole Wizard tab of the Toolbox, e.g., "
ansi inch\Counterbore Holes\Hex Bolt
".
Specify DestinationFilePath with the path and file name of the Excel Workbook (
*.xslx
) you want to import. The Excel file name is formatted as follows:
standard
_
hole class
_
hole type
.xslx
